synopsis.text:
Urabe Mikoto, a reserved transfer student, finds herself in the spotlight when her classmate, Tsubaki Akira, discovers her drooling on her desk during a nap. Intrigued by the peculiar incident, Tsubaki decides to taste the drool, sparking an unusual connection between the two. As they begin to date, they embark on a journey of understanding and growing closer to each other.

On one occasion, the couple joins their friends Ueno and Oka for a double date, which takes an unexpected turn when they get separated. Urabe, intending to buy a love bracelet for Tsubaki, becomes entangled in a web of ropes. With only one chance to rescue her, Tsubaki must rise to the challenge and save Urabe from her predicament.

In a special episode, the group attends a summer festival together, where Tsubaki, Ueno, Oka, and Urabe enjoy the festivities and create unforgettable memories. This heartwarming tale of friendship and love follows the unique bond between Tsubaki and Urabe, as they navigate the ups and downs of their relationship.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
